title: Rune Pages

replies.body:
So Phreak is a really important guy in League of Legends. He's one of the champion designers and is an LCS Shout caster. So... He knows a lot about this stuff. I watched this video to help me get all my Rune Pages up to scratch.
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=GgBhSnIt4RM

If you're not looking to watch a 1 hour video or not looking to make that many rune pages, this is a much shorter video of his.
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=RjTkqqx1kqs

Depends what roles you play. Im one of those idiots who has 20 rune pages but only uses like 6 of them LOL so you have like the perfect amount of pages. Maybe want 1 or 2 more for champion specific pages if you have a "main"

ADC: AD Marks. Amour Seals. MR Glyphs. AS Quints

AD: AD Marks. Armour Seals. MR Glyphs. AD Quints

AP: Magic Pen Marks. Armour Seals. MR Glyphs. AP Quints

AP Extra Damage: Magic Pen Marks. HP Seals. AP Glyphs. AP Quints

Support: AD Marks. Armour OR HP Seals. MR Glyphs. Armour Quints

AP Support: Hybrid Pen Marks. 5 HP Seals 4 Armour Seals. AP Glyphs. 2 Armour and 1 AP Quint.

If you play a lot of tankier champion I suggest making a tanky page that has Scaling Armour and MR.
If you don't play AP mids much swap out the AP extra damage one for another AD one but get Armour Pen Marks for AD Assassins.

List of runes required.

MARKS: AD, Magic Pen, Hybrid Pen.
SEALS: HP, Armour
GLYPHS: AP, MR
QUINTS: AD, AS, AP, Armour

>Depends what roles you play. Im one of those idiots who has 20 rune pages but only uses like 6 of them

Make defense specific ones (IE. AD VS AP, AD VS AD) and take health/CDR/whatever is better in the slots you can change against a different type of enemy.

They are all full of runes, I just don't use them that often. I have like CDR instead of MR, AP v AD pages with armour insted of HP, 3 different Hybrid Pen pages and a Nasus page with 15% cdr. But yeh, I rarely use them.

I use my ADC, AP Damage, Support pages mainly then the regular AD and AP pages when I jungle. Maybe Hybrid Pen AD page for Sion.

Just saying I don't think you honestly need more than 6-10 rune pages unless you want specific runes for every situation

Well personally i have 2 support pages (AP/Tank), 2 top pages (AD/AP), 2 mid pages (VS AD/AP), an ADC page and 2 jungler pages (AP/AD), and then i have ones that don't fit (Kayle/Nasus).

You can get to a handful of pages depending on what you are playing (i have 9 seperate non-champion specific ones)

Also no i play trist and jinx more then i play vayne.

well really all you need is a standard ad page, which can be used for adc top and jungleing. a Mid lane rune page, an attack speed based rune page (for yi and such) and 1 or 2 tank rune pages (ad and support). but it's also nice to have specialised rune pages for tanky ap's with movespeed quints. and don't forget a 36 armor rune page for taric cos that shits op.

Edit: I have 13 rune pages but a lot of mine are specialized to a specific champion
